org.interpss.numeric.sparse

Interface ISparseEqnDouble

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISparseEquation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SparseEqnDoubleImpl, SparseEqnMatrix2x2Impl

    public interface ISparseEqnDouble
extends ISparseEquation
    Sparse Equation of data type double for solving the [A]X=B problem. To outside, the index number is from 0 to n-1

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.interpss.numeric.sparse.base.ISparseEquation

        ISparseEquation.IndexType

        i - the element row number
